00013 #define JOIN_(a,b) a ## b
00014 #define JOIN(a,b) JOIN_(a,b)
00015 #define JOIN3_(a,b,c) a ## b ## c
00016 #define JOIN3(a,b,c) JOIN3_(a,b,c)
00017 
00018 #undef  FLT
00019 #undef  VSIZE
00020 #undef  SFX
00021 #undef  VTYPE
00022 #undef  ALIGNPTR
00023 #undef  ALIGNSTRIDE
00024 #undef  VL_IMCONVCOL
00025 #undef  VL_IMCONVCOLTRI
00026 
00027 #if (FLOAT_TYPE == FLOAT_TYPE_FLOAT)
00028 #  define FLT    float
00029 #  define VSIZE  4
00030 #  define SFX    vf
00031 #  define VTYPE  __m128
00032 #else
00033 #  define FLT    double
00034 #  define VSFX   pd
00035 #  define SFX    vd
00036 #  define VTYPE  __m128d
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #define ALIGNPTR        (sizeof(FLT) * VSIZE - 1)
00040 #define ALIGNSTRIDE     (VSIZE - 1)
00041 #define VL_IMCONVCOL    JOIN(vl_imconvcol_,    SFX)
00042 #define VL_IMCONVCOLTRI JOIN(vl_imconvcoltri_, SFX)
00043 
00044 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00045 VL_EXPORT
00046 void
00047 VL_IMCONVCOL (FLT* dst, int dst_stride,
00048               FLT const* src,
00049               int src_width, int src_height, int src_stride,
00050               FLT const* filt, int filt_begin, int filt_end,
00051               int step, unsigned int flags)
00052 {
00053   int x = 0 ;
00054   int y ;
00055   int dheight = (src_height - 1) / step + 1 ;
00056   vl_bool transp = flags & VL_TRANSPOSE ;
00057   vl_bool zeropad = (flags & VL_PAD_MASK) == VL_PAD_BY_ZERO ;
00058 
00059   /* dispatch to accelerated version */
00060 #ifdef VL_SUPPORT_SSE2
00061   if (vl_cpu_has_sse2() && vl_get_simd_enabled()) {
00062     JOIN3(_,VL_IMCONVCOL,_sse2)
00063     (dst,dst_stride,
00064      src,src_width,src_height,src_stride,
00065      filt,filt_begin,filt_end,
00066      step,flags) ;
00067     return ;
00068   }
00069 #endif
00070 
00071   /* let filt point to the last sample of the filter */
00072   filt += filt_end - filt_begin ;
00073 
00074   while (x < src_width) {
00075     /* Calculate dest[x,y] = sum_p image[x,p] filt[y - p]
00076      * where supp(filt) = [filt_begin, filt_end] = [fb,fe].
00077      *
00078      * CHUNK_A: y - fe <= p < 0
00079      *          completes VL_MAX(fe - y, 0) samples
00080      * CHUNK_B: VL_MAX(y - fe, 0) <= p < VL_MIN(y - fb, height - 1)
00081      *          completes fe - VL_MAX(fb, height - y) + 1 samples
00082      * CHUNK_C: completes all samples
00083      */
00084     FLT const *filti ;
00085     int stop ;
00086 
00087     for (y = 0 ; y < src_height ; y += step) {
00088       FLT acc = 0 ;
00089       FLT v = 0, c ;
00090       FLT const* srci ;
00091 
00092       filti = filt ;
00093       stop = filt_end - y ;
00094       srci = src + x - stop * src_stride ;
00095 
00096       if (stop > 0) {
00097         if (zeropad) {
00098           v = 0 ;
00099         } else {
00100           v = *(src + x) ;
00101         }
00102         while (filti > filt - stop) {
00103           c = *filti-- ;
00104           acc += v * c ;
00105           srci += src_stride ;
00106         }
00107       }
00108 
00109       stop = filt_end - VL_MAX(filt_begin, y - src_height + 1) + 1 ;
00110       while (filti > filt - stop) {
00111         v = *srci ;
00112         c = *filti-- ;
00113         acc += v * c ;
00114         srci += src_stride ;
00115       }
00116 
00117       if (zeropad) v = 0 ;
00118 
00119       stop = filt_end - filt_begin + 1 ;
00120       while (filti > filt - stop) {
00121         c = *filti-- ;
00122         acc += v * c ;
00123       }
00124 
00125       if (transp) {
00126         *dst = acc ; dst += 1 ;
00127       } else {
00128         *dst = acc ; dst += dst_stride ;
00129       }
00130     } /* next y */
00131     if (transp) {
00132       dst += 1 * dst_stride - dheight * 1 ;
00133     } else {
00134       dst += 1 * 1 - dheight * dst_stride ;
00135     }
00136     x += 1 ;
00137   } /* next x */
00138 }
00139 
00140 
00141 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00142 VL_EXPORT
00143 void
00144 VL_IMCONVCOLTRI (FLT* dst, int dst_stride,
00145                  FLT const* src,
00146                  int src_width, int src_height, int src_stride,
00147                  int filt_size,
00148                  int step, unsigned int flags)
00149 {
00150   int x = 0 ;
00151   int y ;
00152   int dheight = (src_height - 1) / step + 1 ;
00153   vl_bool transp = flags & VL_TRANSPOSE ;
00154   vl_bool zeropad = (flags & VL_PAD_MASK) == VL_PAD_BY_ZERO ;
00155 #define fa ((double)(filt_size))
00156   FLT scale = ((FLT) (1.0/(fa*fa))) ;
00157   FLT * buff = vl_malloc(sizeof(FLT) * (src_height + filt_size)) ;
00158   buff += filt_size ;
00159 
00160   while (x < src_width) {
00161     FLT const *srci ;
00162     srci = src + x + src_stride * (src_height - 1) ;
00163 
00164     /* We decompose the convolution by a triangluar signal as the convolution
00165      * by two rectangular signals. The rectangular convolutions are computed
00166      * quickly by computing the integral signals. Each rectangular convolution
00167      * introduces a delay, which is compensated by convolving each in opposite
00168      * directions.
00169      */
00170 
00171     /* integrate backward the column */
00172     buff [src_height - 1] = *srci ;
00173     for (y = src_height-2 ; y >=  0 ; --y) {
00174       srci -= src_stride ;
00175       buff [y] = buff [y+1] + *srci ;
00176     }
00177     if (zeropad) {
00178       for ( ; y >= - filt_size ; --y) {
00179         buff [y] = buff [y+1] ;
00180       }
00181     } else {
00182       for ( ; y >= - filt_size ; --y) {
00183         buff [y] = buff[y+1] + *srci ;
00184       }
00185     }
00186 
00187     /* compute the filter forward */
00188     for (y = - filt_size ; y < src_height - filt_size ; ++y) {
00189       buff [y] = buff [y] - buff [y + filt_size] ;
00190     }
00191     if (! zeropad) {
00192       for (y = src_height - filt_size ; y < src_height ; ++y) {
00193         buff [y] = buff [y] - buff [src_height-1]  *
00194         (src_height - filt_size - y) ;
00195       }
00196     }
00197 
00198     /* integrate forward the column */
00199     for (y = - filt_size + 1 ; y < src_height ; ++y) {
00200       buff [y] += buff [y - 1] ;
00201     }
00202 
00203     /* compute the filter backward */
00204     {
00205       int stride = transp ? 1 : dst_stride ;
00206       dst += dheight * stride ;
00207       for (y = step * (dheight - 1) ; y >= 0 ; y -= step) {
00208         dst -= stride ;
00209         *dst = scale * (buff [y] - buff [y - filt_size]) ;
00210       }
00211     }
00212     x += 1 ;
00213     dst += transp ? dst_stride : 1 ;
00214   } /* next x */
00215   vl_free (buff - filt_size) ;
00216 }
